definitions.definition: Information (or an artefact) that is granted or obtained exclusively.
examples: The editor agreed to keep a lid on a potentially disastrous political scoop in exchange for an exclusive of a happier nature.

definitions.definition: A member of a group who excludes others from their society.
A word or phrase that restricts something, such as only , solely , or simply .

main_definition: Information (or an artefact) that is granted or obtained exclusively.
secondary_definitions: A member of a group who excludes others from their society.
( grammar ) A word or phrase that restricts something, such as only , solely , or simply .
